trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Littleton
There was one other sighting in Littleton on or around July 1st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night at Clement park we were waiting on fireworks display when in the sky an electric blue colored thing was moving in the sky and heading for the clouds and once it moved into the clouds you can still see the thing illuminate and then it came back out of the sky and stood over us but at a far distance for about a minute and then began shooting up it dissapeared. And fifteen minutes later it came back right in the middle of fireworks going off it did the exact same thing and headed back in the same direction.
